channel.title: Shilo village Gem miner and crafter!
channel.description: basicly the title, but i conly want it to cut the normal gems: sapphire, emerald, ruby, diamond, but stack the rest as bolt tips. drop the crushed Gemstone powder and bank if neccisary, thankyou! i think this is just a weird version of a power miner.
